price: এই কিতাব বিশ্বজগতৰ প্ৰতিপালকৰ তৰফৰ পৰা অৱতীৰ্ণ, ইয়াত কোনো সন্দেহ নাই।
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
